Discord.Command.Help.Message:
Hello [AuthorUsername]! I am [BotUsername], your humble Media Bot!

I am very easy to use, please see below for the current available commands:

The currently available commands are:
**[CommandPrefix][TvShowCommand] [TvShowCommandTitle]**
**[CommandPrefix][TvShowCommand] tvdb**
**[CommandPrefix][MovieCommand] [MovieCommandTitle]**
**[CommandPrefix][MovieCommand] tmdb**
**[CommandPrefix]help**
**[CommandPrefix]ping**

__**Here's how to use a command**__
`[CommandPrefix][MovieCommand] [MovieCommandTitle] Deadpool 2`

If you need any additional help with a specific command, simply type the command and I will be glad to help.

If you encounter broken media or are getting errors with me, please notify the server owner.
Feedback is always appreciated, please let the server owner know if I am doing well or not.
